external_games.name: Cat And Dog Salon - Joyful Pets
Cat and Dog Salon: Joyful Pets

name: Cat and Dog Salon: Joyful Pets
storyline: Now you are an owner of the most famous pet salon in the town. All the employees are on holidays these days, so you need to do all the work yourself.
summary: Cat and Dog Salon: Joyful Pets is a pet salon simulator game, which helps make your dreams about having a pet spa or barbershop come true. You can brush and wash the animals, choose clothes, even heal them if they are ill. Try to do your best - make them and their owners happy!
